title: Eliminate any types in SDK provider

title: Consolidate SDK provider for workerd model
description:
**Goal**: Simplify SDK provider to assume workerd execution context.

## RED Phase (Tests First)
- Write tests for createSDKProvider() with workerd context
- Test local vs remote context detection
- Test database binding injection

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)
- Remove bun-specific and node-specific code paths
- Assume workerd execution model throughout
- Simplify environment detection

## REFACTOR Phase
- Extract common SDK utilities
- Add TypeScript strict typing
- Document SDK provider patterns

**Files**: packages/mdxe/src/sdk-provider.ts, packages/mdxe/tests/sdk.test.ts
close_reason: 23 tests passing, workerd SDK provider with local/remote context detection

title: Remove unsafe shell piping for ClickHouse download
description:
RED: Write tests verifying download integrity and failure modes
GREEN: Replace curl|sh with safe binary download, checksum verification, or package manager
REFACTOR: Extract download logic to reusable utility with proper error handling

Files: packages/mdxe/src/commands/db.ts (line 67)
Issue: curl -fsSL | sh pipes untrusted content to shell
close_reason: 17 tests added, safe binary download with SHA512 checksum verification

title: Fix flaky tests (port binding, timing)
description:
RED: Identify and document all flaky test scenarios
GREEN: Implement fixes: dynamic port allocation (0), increase timing margins, add retry logic
REFACTOR: Add test stability guidelines to contributing docs

Files: packages/@mdxe/rpc/*, packages/@mdxe/mcp/* (fixed port 4000 issues)
Issues: Port conflicts, timing-dependent tests, file system race conditions
close_reason: Fixed port binding (dynamic allocation) and timing issues. Created test-utils.ts with getAvailablePort, createTestServer, waitFor, retry utilities. 86 tests stable.

title: Sanitize error responses to prevent stack trace exposure
description:
RED: Write tests that verify stack traces are NOT exposed in production error responses
GREEN: Implement error sanitization that only includes stack traces in debug/development mode
REFACTOR: Create consistent error response format across all handlers

Files: packages/@mdxe/workers/src/index.ts (lines 315-327), packages/mdxe/src/commands/db.ts
Issue: Stack traces leaked to clients in JSON error responses
close_reason: 38 tests added, error sanitization utilities

title: Add discriminated unions for result types
description:
RED: Write type tests that verify result types are properly discriminated
GREEN: Convert ExecutionResult, DeployResult, DoResult to discriminated unions on success boolean
REFACTOR: Update all usages to leverage type narrowing

Files: packages/mdxe/src/types.ts (lines 28-39, 208-219)
Pattern: { success: true; output } | { success: false; error: string }
close_reason: 23 tests, ExecutionResult/DeployResult/DoResult converted to discriminated unions

title: Implement WebSocket live tailing for mdxe
description:
**Goal**: Add real-time event streaming via WebSocket.

## RED Phase (Tests First)
- Write tests for WebSocket connection lifecycle
- Test subscription with filters
- Test automatic reconnection with backoff
- Test keepalive ping/pong

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)
- Create TailClient with WebSocket connection
- Implement subscribe/unsubscribe messages
- Add exponential backoff reconnection (1s base, 30s max)
- Handle connection state callbacks

## REFACTOR Phase
- Add RPC protocol option (capnweb)
- Optimize message batching
- Add connection metrics

**Files**: packages/mdxe/src/tail/ws-client.ts, packages/mdxe/src/tail/ws-client.test.ts
close_reason: Completed with passing tests

title: Port ai-evaluate code generation patterns to @mdxe/workers
description:
**Goal**: Adopt ai-evaluate's code generation architecture for MDX evaluation.

## RED Phase (Tests First)
- Write tests for `generateWorkerCode(mdxContent)` that compiles MDX to worker module
- Write tests for module transformation (ES6 exports → global scope)
- Write tests for console capture and log collection
- Test timeout handling and error isolation

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)
- Port generateWorkerCode() from ai-evaluate patterns
- Implement MDX → JavaScript compilation with @mdxe/isolate
- Add console capture wrapper
- Implement timeout via AbortController

## REFACTOR Phase
- Extract shared utilities to @mdxe/isolate if needed
- Optimize code generation for common patterns
- Add JSDoc documentation

**Files**: packages/@mdxe/workers/src/generate.ts, packages/@mdxe/workers/src/generate.test.ts
close_reason: Completed with passing tests

title: Epic: mdxe tail Command
description: Add mdxe tail command for real-time log/event streaming using ducktail patterns. Support WebSocket live mode and R2 historical mode with importance-based filtering.
close_reason: Tail command implemented with WebSocket live mode, R2 historical mode, importance filtering, and colorized output. 141 tests passing.

title: Epic: mdxe Security Hardening
description: Address critical security issues identified in code review: SQL injection, shell command execution, error message exposure
close_reason: All security tasks complete: SQL injection fixed, shell piping removed, error sanitization implemented

title: Fix SQL injection in db.ts
description:
RED: Write tests that attempt SQL injection via file paths and content with special characters
GREEN: Implement parameterized queries or proper escaping for all SQL operations in db.ts
REFACTOR: Extract SQL query building to utility functions with consistent escaping

Files: packages/mdxe/src/commands/db.ts (lines 150-210)
Issue: Direct string interpolation in SQL queries without parameterization
close_reason: 34 tests added, SQL injection fixed with escapeValue(), sanitizeIdentifier(), buildInsertQuery()

title: Implement worker_loaders integration in @mdxe/workers
description:
**Goal**: Use Cloudflare Dynamic Worker Loaders for production MDX execution.

## RED Phase (Tests First)
- Write tests for `createWorkerFromMDX(id, mdxContent, env)`
- Test worker caching by ID
- Test custom bindings via ctx.exports
- Test globalOutbound sandboxing (network blocking)

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)
- Implement loader.get() wrapper with MDX compilation
- Add module bundling (mainModule + modules object)
- Implement ctx.exports for custom APIs (SDK bindings)
- Add tail workers support for logging

## REFACTOR Phase
- Add worker ID strategies (content hash, version-based)
- Optimize for warm worker reuse
- Add TypeScript types for WorkerCode structure

**Files**: packages/@mdxe/workers/src/loader.ts, packages/@mdxe/workers/src/loader.test.ts
close_reason: 169 tests pass, worker_loaders integration complete with createWorkerFromMDX, createWorkerLoaderAdapter, and cache utilities

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)

- Use only Cloudflare Workers APIs

## REFACTOR Phase

- Add Cloudflare-specific TypeScript types
- Document Workers-only constraints

**Files**: packages/@mdxe/workers/src/index.ts, packages/@mdxe/workers/wrangler.toml

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)

- Implement polling loop with 2s interval
- Add Set-based deduplication by timestamp
- Support date range queries

## REFACTOR Phase

- Add caching for repeated queries

- Test content retrieval via worker_loaders

## GREEN Phase (Implementation)

- Store MDX content, compiled code, and metadata
- Implement tiered storage (DO SQLite hot, R2 warm)
- Add content versioning

## REFACTOR Phase

- Implement content garbage collection
- Add storage metrics

**Files**: packages/@mdxe/deploy/src/do-storage.ts, packages/@mdxe/deploy/src/do-storage.test.ts
close_reason: 35 tests, 27 functions created for DO SQLite + R2 tiered storage, versioning, diffing, garbage collection, metrics
